title: Knowing animals
brief_description: Three cinemagazine items including: Zoo Babies: Shows the animal nursery at Vancouver’s Stanley Park Zoo, where baby animals are tended by a special keeper who is freely assisted by visiting children. Dog Gets Man: Explains how German shepherd pups are matched with police constables and coached for active duty. The Cows Come Home: A round-up of fourteen thousand head of cattle at a half-million-acre ranch at Douglas Lake in the British Columbia interior.
